participant_1.name: Ella

participant_1.background: i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i love to go to disney world every year. i'm in the third grade.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and practical, enjoys riding and racing motorbikes.
participant_2.background: i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head. my main transportation is my motorbike. i have light skin with big brown eyes. i waitress during the day to supplement my income. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race.
